## ICreateVerifiablePresentationLDArgs interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Encapsulates the parameters required to create a [W3C Verifiable Presentation](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#presentations)

This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICreateVerifiablePresentationLDArgs
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                                           | Type                                                 | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [challenge?](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablepresentationldargs.challenge.md)                     | string                                               | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> <i>(Optional)</i> Optional (only JWT) string challenge parameter to add to the verifiable presentation.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [domain?](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablepresentationldargs.domain.md)                           | string                                               | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> <i>(Optional)</i> Optional string domain parameter to add to the verifiable presentation.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [fetchRemoteContexts?](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablepresentationldargs.fetchremotecontexts.md) | boolean                                              | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> <i>(Optional)</i> Set this to true if you want the <code>@context</code> URLs to be fetched in case they are not preloaded.Defaults to <code>false</code>                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [keyRef?](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablepresentationldargs.keyref.md)                           | string                                               | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. The key handle ([IKey.kid](./core.ikey.kid.md)) from the internal database.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [presentation](./credential-ld.icreateverifiablepresentationldargs.presentation.md)                | [PresentationPayload](./core.presentationpayload.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The json payload of the Presentation according to the [canonical model](https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#presentations).The signer of the Presentation is chosen based on the <code>holder</code> property of the <code>presentation</code><code>@context</code>, <code>type</code> and <code>issuanceDate</code> will be added automatically if omitted. |
